statements.sql: update `menu` set `bid` = '2', `name` = '爽翻天', `price` = '80', `caipin` = '爽翻天啦。' where `id` = '26'

SELECT bu.name AS bname,bu.photo AS bphoto,m.name AS mname,m.images,m.price,m.recommend,cg.name AS cgname,m.id AS mid FROM business AS bu,menu AS m,category AS cg WHERE m.cid=cg.id AND m.bid=bu.id AND bu.did=1
SELECT count(*) as count FROM business AS bu,menu AS m,category AS cg WHERE m.cid=cg.id AND m.bid=bu.id AND bu.did=1
